channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Mettre un robot dans un smartphone, Honor l’a fait et le résultat est bluffant
item.description: On a enfin vu le Robot Phone de Honor, cet appareil hybride qui mêle téléphonie mobile et robotique. Équipé d'une intelligence artificielle multimodale capable de comprendre son environnement, ce terminal n'est plus un concept, il arrive dans le commerce.

item.title: On a vu le robot de Honor faire un salto arrière au MWC, et c’est aussi impressionnant qu’effrayant
item.description: Honor a fait son show aujourd'hui à Barcelone. On s'y était préparé, mais le constructeur chinois a tout de même déployé les grands moyens au MWC 2026. Il a délaissé quelques instants ses smartphones pour faire monter sur scène son premier robot humanoïde.

item.title: Best Buy Canada seemingly just leaked Sonos' next portable speaker
item.description: A product briefly posted on the Canadian Best Buy website this weekend suggests Sonos may soon announce a new portable speaker called the Sonos Play. The speaker offers Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity, AirPlay 2 support, Trueplay to tune the sound based on wherever you've placed it and voice controls, according to a page that's since been removed. Best Buy Canada had it listed for $399.99 CAD (or a little under 300 US dollars), and put the release date at March 31.The listing may have been taken down, but not before it was spotted and reposted on Reddit. The product page for the Sonos Play al...

item.title: Home Depot's spring sale has arrived — these are the backyard and home upgrades I'm buying
item.description: Home Depot's 2026 spring sale is live, and I'm rounding up everything that I'm buying for my backyard and home, including patio furniture, flowers, grills, and more.

item.title: South Korean Police Lose Seized Crypto By Posting Password Online
item.description: The digital equivalent of snatching coins from someone's outstretched hands.
